As a founding member of the United Nations, we have long been committed to defending international norms and standards and work towards the goal of world peace. As part of that effort, we're ready to join all members who wish to support us in this mission.
The threat you perceive from Purple is significant but it's important that we find a peaceful solution.
You have been attacked by another nation. This is deeply concerning for all of us.

I extend my deepest condolences on behalf of my country. Our two nations share mutual economic and security interests. As a result, we should maintain diplomatic ties and collaborate to address shared concerns in our strategic relationship.
I wish to remind you that the two of us share exceptional historical bonds that have been reflected in our support for democratic values.

Even though we have had significant strategic frictions between our countries in the past decade or so, both of our countries currently enjoy fruitful commercial relationships. As a result of this relationship, both countries benefit from economic growth. We hope you will be prudent and not take any reckless steps.
Purple, I wish to strongly condemn Orange's aggressive action.
